title: Account Compromised
body:
Hi there,

I have had my account compromised and stolen from me. Luckily i know someone with a league account who is happy enough to let me post this on the forums.

I believe my email address was also compromised as there was no correspondence from Riot about my password change or even my contact email being changed. I have since reformatted my PC

Using the recover password or recover account is not working for me.

I have sent an email to the riot support group a couple days ago and have had no responses from them

My account has so many skins and am hoping that i can get it returned to me.

Has anyone else had any luck from Riot in this regard? If so, how long did it take?

My summoner name is: Fazza Bruth

Desperately wanting to return to the field.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey Fazza Bruth,

I've locked the account in case of compromise. Your ticket is still in queue to be resolved, thanks for all the info you've provided but please be patient as we work through a current backlog of tickets.

Fantastic!

At least i know my account wont be used.

Thank you so much for your speedy reply!
